DOC.brief_summary: We conduct 2x2 factorial randomize control trial test separate synergistic effect in-person hands-on dietary physical activity change curriculum ( i.e. , Mi Vida Saludable program ) e-communication strategy ( text messaging , email newsletter interactive website ) change dietary physical activity behavior among diverse population Latina breast cancer survivor complete breast cancer treatment . Participants evenly randomize 4 arm : in-person education alone , e-communication alone , in-person education plus e-communication , control .
DOC.brief_title: Diet Physical Activity Changes Among Latina Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: There clear diet physical activity guideline cancer survivor : eat diet high fruits/vegetables low energy-dense food engage 150 minute moderate-to-vigorous physical activity week . However , cancer survivor provide , , resource meet guideline limit data support cancer survivor achieve sustain dietary change . There even few behavioral change resource available minority cancer survivor . Few study examine separate synergistic effect in-person education electronic `` e- '' communication strategy change maintain health behavior .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female . 2 . 21 year age old . 3 . Selfidentify Hispanic/Latina . 4 . Speak Spanish English . Disease Related Criteria 5 . Medical history histologically confirm stage 0 , I , II , III breast cancer , evidence metastatic disease . Prior/ Current Therapy Criteria 6 . At least 90 day post chemotherapy , biologic therapy , radiation therapy treatment and/or breast surgery . Current use hormonal therapy permit ( e.g. , tamoxifen aromatase inhibitor ) . Accessibility Criteria 7 . Have access computer smartphone . Clinical/ Laboratory Criteria 8 . No history smoking within past 30 day . 9 . No uncontrolled diabetes mellitus define Hgb A1C > 7 % 10 . Consume < 5 serving fruit vegetable per day and/or engage < 150 weekly minute moderate vigorous physical activity . Any criterion meet inclusion .
